divs: Sighting DetailsWitnessed a glowing spherical object in downtown Mecosta at dusk. It hovered above the moon and then slowly descended down. It faded out of sight at about the level of the trees. My partner and I have witnessed many of these however, a downward trajectory is pretty rare for us to see.
Summary: Glowing orb hovering above moon and then descended down
trends: There has been one other sighting in Mecosta
There were no other sightings in Mecosta on or around April 24th 2013
